name: Buddy3000
description:
You have been tasked with defending your homeworld from the evil aliens. You have to stop them before they can make the jump to light speed. Collaborate with your only turret by building rails that you can build. Watch out, because your enemies can come in many shapes and sizes and hordes.

This is a submission to the Wowie 4.0 game jam. It was made in 3 days.
